name: docklock-plus
title: DockLock Plus
description: Control macOS Dock position and automation
author: IGHOR

commands.name: set-dock-control-mode
commands.title: Set Dock Control Mode
commands.subtitle: Select Dock Control operation mode
commands.description: Shows a list of Dock Control modes to choose from and applies the selected mode using 'DockLock Plus mode <token>'

commands.name: move-dock-left
commands.title: Move Dock Left
commands.subtitle: Send the Dock to the left side of the screen
commands.description: Moves the Dock to the left edge of the current or specified display using DockLock Plus automation

commands.name: move-dock-right
commands.title: Move Dock Right
commands.subtitle: Send the Dock to the right side of the screen
commands.description: Moves the Dock to the right edge of the current or specified display using DockLock Plus automation

commands.name: move-dock-up
commands.title: Move Dock Up
commands.subtitle: Send the Dock to the up side of the screen
commands.description: Moves the Dock to the up edge of the current or specified display using DockLock Plus automation

commands.name: move-dock-down
commands.title: Move Dock Down
commands.subtitle: Send the Dock to the down side of the screen
commands.description: Moves the Dock to the down edge of the current or specified display using DockLock Plus automation

commands.name: move-dock-to-display-by-name
commands.title: Move Dock to Display by Name
commands.subtitle: Move the Dock to a specific display by Name
commands.description: Relocates the Dock to a display using its name

commands.name: allow-dock-on-display
commands.title: Allow Dock on Display
commands.subtitle: Allow Dock appearance on a specific display
commands.description: Shows a list of displays and allows Dock appearance on the selected one using DockLock Plus automation

commands.name: disallow-dock-on-display
commands.title: Disallow Dock on Display
commands.subtitle: Disallow Dock appearance on a specific display
commands.description: Shows a list of displays and disallows Dock appearance on the selected one using DockLock Plus automation

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
